name: Discord Online
description:
The game only has one level, which is currently under construction.

The end goal is that you will start with nothing but a simple item and some skills, then you will need to adventure through the various levels, defeating enemies and leveling up, finding loot, and capturing new skills. Dying will be permanent and reset you to the start of level one.

You can adventure with your friends or solo. Although currently, any player can enter anyone's game. This will be restricted in the future.

Controls:

WSAD for movement.

Q, E, Left Mouse, Right Mouse for skill use

K to open your skill list

I to open your inventory

P to PK
